attributes.action: The government to take control of the British energy companies ensuring morality
attributes.additional_details: Energy rises have been thrust upon the British people that do not match inflation in any way. Excuses have been made, but the control of British energy companies by Europe is ensuring we are punished. Because this is morally wrong, we should take control of this ourselves in Britain. Use the renewable energy sources as much as possible ourselves. Pass much of the savings to the public.
attributes.background: Using law, sieze control of the British energy companies to ensure standards of fairness are upheld. Principally to make sure fair morally and ethical standards are maintained for the British public.
